ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Instruments (was complete heal)
ygData.msgSnippet: Look out, next thing you know that Erudin quest will be morphed into a Velvet Elvis Painting quest and the reward will be an Elvis Tunic, AC: 4, +10 Cha.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Look out, next thing you know that Erudin quest will be morphed into a
Velvet Elvis Painting quest and the reward will be an Elvis Tunic, AC: 4,
+10 Cha. I think Ping Fizzlecutter (sp) already sells Elvis wigs (Mane
Attraction) doesn't he?

Kit

Though I do think some of the bard-only clothing should have included
toe-shoes, sequined leotards, and Vegas-chorus-line-style, rediculously
large headdresses. Oh wait, we've got the head dresses...

Peace
Evulia, Lady of the Dance
